2D Compass Properties

Requires: Base Development System

Property Description
Format:R Scale Format Sets the format string of the R scale. Details
Plot Specific:Active Plot Gets or sets the active plot. Details
Plot Specific:Compass Name Shows the name of the plot. Details
Plot Specific:Compass Color Shows the color of the plot. Details
Plot Specific:Compass Line Style Specifies the line style. Details
Plot Specific:Compass Line Width Sets the width of the plot. Details
Plot Specific:Compass Size Sets the symbol size for the compass. Details
Plot Specific:Show Phase Scale Shows the phase scale around the plot area. Details
R Scale:Editable Allows you to edit the value of the scale. Details
R Scale:Visible Shows the scale. Details
R Scale:Style Specifies the scale style. Details
R Scale:Scale Fit Fits the scale to the data. Details
R Scale:Tick:Major Tick Color Sets the color of the major tick mark. Details
R Scale:Tick:Minor Tick Color Sets the color of the minor tick mark. Details
R Scale:Grid:Major Grid Color Sets the color of the major grid on the scale. Details
R Scale:Grid:Minor Grid Color Sets the color of the minor grid on the scale. Details
R Scale:Range:Minimum Sets the minimum value of the scale. Details
R Scale:Range:Maximum Sets the maximum value of the scale. Details
R Scale:Range:Increment Sets the increment value of the scale. Details
R Scale:Range:Minor Increment Minor increment value of scale. Details
R Scale:Range:Start Sets the start value of the scale. Details
R Scale:Marker:Visible Indicates whether the tick marker is visible. Details
R Scale:Marker:FG Color Specifies the foreground color of the tick marker. Details
R Scale:Marker:BG Color Specifies the background color of the tick marker. Details
R Scale:Marker:Font Name Specifies the font name of the tick marker. Details
R Scale:Marker:Font Size Specifies the font size of the tick marker. Details
R Scale:Marker:Font Bold Indicates whether the text is bold. Details
R Scale:Marker:Font Italic Indicates whether the text is italic. Details
R Scale:Marker:Font Strike Indicates whether the text is in the strikeout font. Details
R Scale:Marker:Font Underline Indicates whether the text is underlined. Details
R Scale:Name Label:Visible Indicates whether the name label is visible. Details
R Scale:Name Label:FG Color Specifies the foreground color of the name label. Details
R Scale:Name Label:BG Color Specifies the background color of the name label. Details
R Scale:Name Label:Font Name Specifies the font name of the name label. Details
R Scale:Name Label:Font Size Specifies the font size of the name label. Details
R Scale:Name Label:Font Bold Indicates whether the text is bold. Details
R Scale:Name Label:Font Italic Indicates whether the text is italic. Details
R Scale:Name Label:Font Strike Indicates whether the text is in the strikeout font. Details
R Scale:Name Label:Font Underline Indicates whether the text is underlined. Details
R Scale:Name Label:Justification Gets and sets the justification. Details
R Scale:Name Label:Text Displays text in the scale. Details
